definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Caesar Palace Hotel is a foreign-related business-type hotel.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒皇宫大酒店是一家商务涉外型酒店。

sentences.english: In the street of Palace, there will be "Happy" word in every streetlight .
sentences.chinese: 在皇宫外大街的每盏路灯上，也都绘着“喜”字。

sentences.english: Officials in Ming and Qing Dynasties were often sent to Qingshuijiang-Miao territory to collect timbers for royal palaces.
sentences.chinese: 明清两朝为修建皇宫到清水江“苗疆”征办“皇木”。

sentences.english: At the same time, another tragicomedy is played in the Imperial Palace of Tand Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，唐朝皇宫望仙台上，也上演着一幕悲喜剧。

sentences.english: Hampton Court Palace in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames. (Jason Hawkes)
sentences.chinese: 汉普敦皇宫，泰晤士河畔里士满，伦敦。

sentences.english: Nate: Uh, your mom told me you guys were staying here at the palace.
sentences.chinese: 你妈妈告诉我你们暂住在皇宫酒店。

sentences.english: The imperial tombs lie opposite the palaces across Henghe River.
sentences.chinese: 王室墓群隔洹河与皇宫相望。

sentences.english: Soft yee fu enter the palace, become a female officer.
sentences.chinese: 傅柔阴差阳错下进入皇宫，成为司织女官。

sentences.english: You have to wait in a large entrance hall before being shown into the court proper.
sentences.chinese: 进入皇宫时先要在入口大厅等候，由人带领进入正殿。

sentences.english: Emperor all of the imperial palace welcomed two guests, is exactly Liu Feng and moxa Lin Nuo.
sentences.chinese: 帝都的皇宫迎来了两名客人，正是柳风和艾琳娜。

sentences.english: Jocelyn: Bangkok, which is the capital of Thailand , is surrounded by gorgeous palaces and temples.
sentences.chinese: 泰国首都曼谷，那边到处都是辉煌华丽的皇宫和寺庙。

sentences.english: Puppet want to visit the palace, how walk, see chart below.
sentences.chinese: 想来参观伪满皇宫，怎么走？请看下图。

sentences.english: The gold-tiled roofs of the imperial palaces glowed in the Peking sun.
sentences.chinese: 皇宫的金色琉璃瓦屋顶在北京的阳光下散发着光辉。

sentences.english: The Seapalahotel takes giving birth to the fierce seafood and venison as characteristic mainly.
sentences.chinese: 海上皇宫假日酒店主要以生猛海鲜及野味为特色。

sentences.english: A grand Qianqiu banquet was held in the royal palace.
sentences.chinese: 皇宫里还要举行盛大的千秋宴会。

sentences.english: Cro over canals and pa by smaller palaces and other cla ical structures.
sentences.chinese: 穿过运河并经过较小的皇宫以及其他的古典建筑物。

definition: Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
Tanei township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
place at the imperial court, where emperor handled government affairs, gave orders etc
Hall of Supreme Harmony, the largest of the three halls that constitute the heart of the Outer Court of the Forbidden City 紫禁城[Zi3 jin4 cheng2]
main hall of a Buddhist temple
royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
